goals__remit:
Matikem is a French competitiveness cluster working with materials, chemical and green chemical industries. 
 
Its mission is to facilitate and accelerate the emergence of new R&D projects, to support collaborative innovation projects from the setting up until obtaining the necessary funding and the market launch of new products, services or processes. 
 
With 87 members, Matikem (French national cluster) has expertise in green chemicals and biobased materials for applications in 8 main industries: tableware, packaging, printing, plastics, agro-food, transport, construction and medical industries. 
 
Matikem gathers the know-how of companies (50% of the members) and research and technology organisations (40% of the members), and brings together researchers, academia, entrepreneurs and the civil society in mutualised labs and projects mixing fundamental and applied research on a multidisciplinary and cross-sectoral approach.  
 
Matikem supports its members to identify and beneficiate from adequate services for each profile and each situation: 
 
- Facilitate networking 
 
- Events: information or training sessions, round tables, seminars, conferences, technical seminars or workshops dedicated to the emergence of projects 
 
-  Technology watch and economic intelligence services 
 
- Support for project development at regional, national and European level 
 
- Visibility for Matikem members in France and abroad 
 
Matikem finally offers to work under research or technical cooperation agreements with partners and is also open to collaborate on EU projects.
